name: Snowfall (goNlurk)
description:
A simple game to pass time, especially if bored in class. Run around as a little penguin and collect snowflakes and fish that fall from the sky - but avoid the icicles! You can unlock skins by acquiring snowflakes, fish, and completing challenges. There are two gamemodes: The default starts off slow but gets progressively faster. Endless mode is unlocked after completing the default mode, in which you can be thrown into fast-paced gameplay immediately.

Controls:
WASD - Movement (arrow keys work too)
SPACE - Jump
SHIFT - Dash (while in air)
ESC - Open menu

Notes:
- I didn't make any music, so listen to your own if you want B)
- Upon running the executable for the first time, your computer might think that it is an unsafe file. If you trust me, then click "Run anyway" and you should be good forever. Is not a virus, trust <3
